titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale College, Class of 1927 Motion Pictures
Yale College, Class of 1927 Motion Pictures
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:49

did.unittitle: Yale College, Class of 1927 motion pictures

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of a motion picture film documenting senior year events and the 6th anniversary reunion of the Yale College Class of 1927.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 10-A (YRG 10-A), Records of Yale College classes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale College, Class of 1927 Motion Pictures (RU 550). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of a motion picture film documenting senior year events and the 6th anniversary reunion of the Yale College Class of 1927.

did.unittitle: Motion picture films documenting senior events and activities of the Class of 1927
Senior events and activities of the Class of 1927
